title: League Client and Phone tethering.
body:
This is how I normally play my league matches (with my 4g) since it offers me a fairly decent ping and is much more stable than my home internet.

I played just fine last night and this morning before work but not for some reason the client will not launch or respond when I start using my 4g tethering.

replies.body: 4G is excellent for mobile data, but you're not going to get a lot of bang trying to play games like lol which requires a constant and strong connection.  Your connection may be failing to establish comms to the servers at this point, so it can't let you get on.  I suggest hitting us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if our tech team can help work something out.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
